title: What punishment is charged on cheque forgery? - Quora

response.answer_text: The penalty may vary by state in the US. In some, forging checks of $250 or less is punishable by up to one year in jail and a $3,000 fine; but when the amount of the check exceeds $250, the penalty increases to up to five years in prison and a $10,000 http://fine.In One thing to keep in mind is that the penalty does not end after the jail time is served and the fines paid. Forgery is a felony and as such stays with you and will keep you from getting many jobs.

Forgery for purpose of cheating Section 468 IPC While Sec 465deals with mere forgery, sec 468 of the Indian Penal Code states that if a person commits forgery with a document or electronic record with the intention of cheating, they shall be punished with a term which may extend up to 7 years and shall also be liable to fine.
